metadata.name: HackTool - PCHunter Execution
metadata.comment: Detects suspicious use of PCHunter, a tool like Process Hacker to view and manipulate processes, kernel options and other low level stuff

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\pchunter64.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\pchunter32.exe')) OR lower(process.file.name) = lower('pchunter.exe') AND lower(device.desc) = lower('epoolsoft windows information view tools') OR contains(lower(process.file.hashes.value), lower('sha1=5f1cbc3d99558307bc1250d084fa968521482025')) OR contains(lower(process.file.hashes.value), lower('md5=987b65cd9b9f4e9a1afd8f8b48cf64a7')) OR contains(lower(process.file.hashes.value), lower('sha256=2b214bddaab130c274de6204af6dba5aeec7433da99aa950022fa306421a6d32')) OR contains(lower(process.file.hashes.value), lower('imphash=444d210cea1ff8112f256a4997eed7ff')) OR contains(lower(process.file.hashes.value), lower('sha1=3fb89787cb97d902780da080545584d97fb1c2eb')) OR contains(lower(process.file.hashes.value), lower('md5=228dd0c2e6287547e26ffbd973a40f14')) OR contains(lower(process.file.hashes.value), lower('sha256=55f041bf4e78e9bfa6d4ee68be40e496ce3a1353e1ca4306598589e19802522c')) OR contains(lower(process.file.hashes.value), lower('imphash=0479f44df47cfa2ef1ccc4416a538663'))))

output.summary: Detects suspicious use of PCHunter, a tool like Process Hacker to view and manipulate processes, kernel options and other low level stuff
